channel.title: PI Client Error once logged in
channel.description:
I was adding PI 602 Animations I added them all perfectly. However when I try to login I get this error
[CODE]Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 103 at Class36.method531(Class36.java:187) at Model.method470(Model.java:1640) at ObjectDef.method581(ObjectDef.java:248) at ObjectDef.method578(ObjectDef.java:118) at Animable_Sub5.getRotatedModel(Animable_Sub5.java:41) at Animable.method443(Animable.java:10) at WorldController.method314(WorldController.java:1257) at WorldController.method313(WorldController.java:1036) at client.method146(client.java:12063) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:8238) at client.processDrawing(client.java:8949) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:4738) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/CODE]
I remember seeing a fix for this I think it was in client.java but I can't remember where it was any help?

item.title: PI Client Error once logged in
item.dc:creator: @JuniorCautionz JuniorCautionz

I was adding PI 602 Animations I added them all perfectly. However when I try to login I get this error
